description: MainActivity.kt defines the main activity for an Android app that provides a Q&A interface. It manages user inputs, displays conversation history with a scrollable list, and communicates with a backend API via ApiClient. The class handles UI interactions, network requests, and conversation updates.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: MainActivity is the entry point activity for the Q&A mobile frontend. It manages UI components, user interactions, network requests, and displays conversation history.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes UI components, sets up event handlers, and displays a greeting message.

methods.name: onSendClicked
methods.description: Handles sending user questions, manages UI states, performs network call, and updates conversation history.

methods.name: addUserMessage
methods.description: Adds a user's message to the conversation list and updates the display.

methods.name: addAssistantMessage
methods.description: Adds an assistant's response to the conversation list and updates the display.

methods.name: scrollToBottom
methods.description: Scrolls the conversation list to the latest message.
